Html:
if the
"chance to be crit = -0,799996" (whit out any % char after)
what dose that mean?
defence rating is 53, and resilince is 0

(data from kealline@neptulon.eu in release v2.1.2)

Shouldn't is show a % number, and a positve one?
And is this making the Relative Stat Values for defence rating and resilince wrong?
giving resilince 0points seams incorekt, but as i never checked this out pre WLK, i have no ide.
48.44 stamina
19,15 defence
0 resilince

Survival of the fittest now reduces your chance to be crit by 6% rather than the old 3%, and an 83 mob only has a 5.6% chance to crit you.  That means that resilience is worth almost nothing in PvE, and defense only adds to your dodge chance and chance to be missed.
I've added the missing % sign for the next release. Otherwise, everything is correct. You do indeed have a negative chance to be crit, from SotF.
